title: Counterplay to Zhonyas
body:
I think everyone knows that Zhonyas is a very strong item and quite annoying to verse and I would like to see some more counterplay slowly be added into the game to mimic power creep.

Right now Zhonyas doesn't have a counterplay, and having an item that completely ruins a champion kit is quite toxic to the game. (Zed, Rengar, Pyke, etc...)

Example 1: Target an enemy champion, this champion can no longer use actives for the next 3 seconds.

Example 2: Target enemy champion, pull this champion out of stasis (zhonya cooldown reduced by half) 

It doesn't have to be these examples, pretty much anything would work, I would just like to see some counterplay to the item, so it feels more fun to verse.

As a Nocturne OTP, i hate Zhonyas, GA, and any anti-assassin item in the game....
but assassins would be overpowered if Zhonyas and GA didnt exist.
We have free-reign for the first half of the game.
After that, they finish their stopwatch items, and we have to actually think about what we do.
Zhonya’s only seems super strong because it’s 1 of 2 defensive items in the game that actually works anymore.
We've known this for such a long time though, Riot are just r%%%%%ed and won't introduce new items for some reason. This should not be a reason for Zhonyas to be intentionally overpowered.

The general consensus on this Board is that all assassin-type champions should be removed from the game. Don't bother trying to point out that champions like {{champion:101}} {{champion:99}} get to abuse the very same defensive item that was meant to enable champions like {{champion:9}} {{champion:25}}, who need to 1v5 dive to function. Nobody will hear you.
The counterplay is not putting yourself out of position to chase someone who has the item.
Zhonya's was literally created to shut down the types of characters you mentioned. That's its primary purpose and is why it offers armor.

Poor mage defensive itemization with armor is a problem and I won't deny that. For some reason almost all mage items give health. I think if they started removing all the health stats on items like morellos, liandrys, rylais, etc... and started giving actual defensive options, we could go from there, but as it is right now, Zhonyas is incredibly broken with no counterplay to it for assassins.

The counterplay to Zhonyas is that Zhonyas is the only thing keeping you alive in the first place.
As soon as you use it, youre a sitting duck with no way to defend yourself.
All Zhonyas does, is force Assassins to be more reserved when they go in to delete a target.
*is it worth it to burst Xerath and force his Zhonyas while he has 2 friends nearby?" -probably not. Youre prob gonna die for nothing but a Zhonyas cooldown.
*is it worth it to pop Xeraths Zhonyas mid teamfight where he is ulting from the back, and is going to be isolated for atleast 2seconds?* -yes. You stop Xerath from being artillery, You force him to use the only CD keeping him alive, and you force the rest of the enemy team to peel back to his aid, while u just slip away.
All Zhonyas does is prevent you from going in and doing whatever you want, and getting a kill even when you made a incredibly stupid/greedy play.
Which is something assassins are notorious for getting away with before the completion of Zhonyas/GA/PD.

If youre against Zhonyas because it has "no counterplay".
Why arent you against assassins diving in to 1v4 scenarios, getting a kill, and then getting away? That is the epitome of no counterplay.

First off, Is this a typo? 

> The counterplay to Zhonyas is that Zhonyas is the only thing keeping you alive in the first place.

For the rest,

You can make an argument for almost everything to try and and make a broken item sound fair. For example:

+65 damage
+18 lethality
10% cdr
Active: Champion becomes untargetable and invulnerable, reverting back to where they were 5 seconds ago.

The counterplay to this is that almost every Mage in the game has hard CC, which they can easily used on an assassin to lock them down if they dive in for an easy kill because of how squishy assassins are. Mages need to be more careful about how they use their hard CC. 
"Is it worth using my hard CC on this bruiser when there is an assassin in the game and we can't see them?" -probably not. You're prob gonna die for wasting your hard CC.

The Xerath example is such a horrible example. In almost every teamfight, Xerath isn't just going to sit there away from everyone else and hide. He is going to be with his team and fighting. Even if he decides to ult, knowing there is an assassin that is hidden, and his entire enemy team ditches him, an assassin being able to easily kill him should be normal. This is only one champion in the game as well. What is an assassin's job if they can't even kill a squishy?

>All Zhonyas does is prevent you from going in and doing whatever you want, and getting a kill even when you made a incredibly stupid/greedy play.

Which assassin in the game can jump in, get a kill, and just get out?

I can't think of any assassin that can dive in, be able to one shot someone, and get away.

Maybe Zed?

Even if this is true; a zed main would need to let me know, I don't think an item should be added to the game just because one champion exists. If an assassin is able to do this, their kits should be reevaluated and changed because it would be too strong.

Rengar, Zed, Akali, Talon, Katarina, Ekko, Fizz, Qiyana, Elise, Leblanc, Pyke, Khazix. 

Surely I missed a few but those are some of the champs I can think of off the top that can easily 1 shot champs and then "just get out". Rengar being the easiest imo since his combo requires the least skill to use, again imo, and the fact he has removal of cc, speed boost, burst heal, builds items that both give him further speed and cc shield in ghostblade n edge of night...In some cases he doesn't even require the use of his ult to initiate his 1 shotting, depending on the positioning of himself and his target. When he doesn't have to ult to do so, he can simply use that as a means of escape since it makes him invisible and 2x faster than everyone else.

I do think some of their kits should be tuned down some since the majority of them overkill their targets and can escape too easily...but at the same time they ARE assassins and if they can't 1 shot enemies then what is the point of them. Riot wants this to be the case because it makes bad players feel strong/good. Gives the player an ego boost and makes them feel powerful knowing they destroyed an enemy by pushing a couple buttons and it keeps them coming back.

> Which assassin in the game can jump in, get a kill, and just get out?
> 
> I can't think of any assassin that can dive in, be able to one shot someone, and get away.
> 
> Maybe Zed?
> 
> Even if this is true; a zed main would need to let me know, I don't think an item should be added to the game just because one champion exists. If an assassin is able to do this, their kits should be reevaluated and changed because it would be too strong.

Wait which assassin can't do this last bit???  Talon can wall hop/ult away, Ekko can ult, Zed can teleport to 2 different shadows, don't get me started on LB, Khazix can reset his jump with a kill, but also has invisibility, eve is perma invisible AND can ult away, MAYBE Fizz is the only one that can't really do this without giving up huge damage.

It's only if you get quite fed that you can just jump into a group and get a kill, and even then, many champions have counters and can build to counter the assassin to stop them from doing so quite easily.

Your point about Evelynn is true though, I think she deserves a nerf/change.

Also, Ekko isn't an assassin.
